pros:
Very few active buffs, only buff you need to constantly keep up is Maple Warrior
  • Most buffs are passives
Has a bind skill Spirit Trap
Has a revive Summon Other Spirit
cons:
Damage is not the highest compared to other classes
    Makes up for that with powerful utility

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Rate: +15% + (90% when Critical Insight is active)

details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level 20 & 30

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Spirit Claw - Reinforce, Bush Rush and Extra Strike
  • Bomb Punch - Reinforce and Critical Chance OR Fire Fox Spirits - Reinforce and Summon Chance
    • This is purely your preference if you mob with Spirit Claw or Bomb Punch
    • If you have 100% Crit Chance you can substitute Bomb Punch - Critical Chance

primary.desc: Teleports to the nearest enemy in range
details: If there are no enemies in range, you will teleport forward

primary.desc: Throws two quick punches forward
details: Completing the Shade storyline will upgrade to Flash Fist which deals increased %Damage

primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.desc: Slams down on the ground creating shockwaves
details: Can be held to continuously punch the ground
Creates a shockwave that slows nearby enemies

primary.desc: Pulls enemies above you down to your platform and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from Shade

primary.desc: Pulls enemies in front of you towards you and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from Shade

primary.desc: Dash backwards
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Avoidability

primary.desc: Toggles the Fox Spirits from Fox Spirit Mastery to appear
Grants a chance when attacking to summon Fox Spirits that seek and attack enemies
Strikes forward 3 times. The final strike sends out a shockwave that deals additional damage
Spin to pull enemies behind you to in front of you and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from Shade

primary.desc: Summons a flurry of spirits that spin around you dealing damage
Creates a trap that binds enemies caught in it
When hit by a fatal attack, you will be revived, knocking by enemies and dealing damage
details: You are briefly invincible after reviving

primary.desc: When attacking enemies, you have a chance to debuff enemies
details: Enemy takes increased %Damage and has reduced %Accuracy and %Avoidability

primary.desc: Punches several times forward
details: Has a chance to stun enemies
Can be held down to continuously keep punching

primary.desc: Cleave forward damaging enemies in front of you
Strike forward damaging and debuffing enemies in front of you
details: [Debuff]: All attacks against this target are critical hits and will restore some %Max HP. Target will also take some damage over time

primary.desc: Strikes forward damaging and splitting the souls of enemies hit
details: The soul is a stationary mirror image which will deal damage to the original enemy when attacked
Grants additional EXP when defeating the soul or the original enemy

primary.desc: Summons three guardian spirits that protect you from either a debuff or incoming damage
details: One Guardian Spirit is consumed after protecting you from the incoming debuff or attack
Increases summon chance, %Damage, and number of repeat attacks
Color of attack is changed to orange/red from blue

primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now increases %Crit Damage and %Final Damage

hyperActive.desc: Increases %Damage, %Boss Damage, %Ignore DEF and Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and grants flat Attack
details: At Lv. 200 you can complete a questline to enhance this skill

hyperActive.desc: Increases %Damage, %Boss Damage, %Ignore DEF and Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and grants flat Attack
details: When attacking there is a chance to drop Livers that increase the duration of Spirit Bond Max

There will also be a summoned Spirit Guardian that will attack with you:
  • [Liver Circle Dance]: The Spirit Guardian will attack nearby enemies
  • [Spirit Frenzy]: The Spirit Guardian will cast a smaller version of
  • [Spirit Ward]: The Spirit Guardian uses on Shade as long as is not already active

hyperActive.desc: Transform into an invincible spirit that attacks enemies in a large area

fifthMain.name: Spirit Flow
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, resets cooldowns, Duration: 55, the spirits guiding you automatically trigger an attack skill when you perform an attack, excluding 5th Job Skills, when you perform an attack, Key-down Skill Durations: 3 sec, Final Damage: +17%\nSpirit Attack Cooldown: 2 Sec.\nCooldown: 120 Sec.
fifthMain.desc: Whenever you attack, spirits will automatically appear and attack alongside you
details: The spirits come from your skills from all Job Advancements except 5th Job
Also resets all cooldowns for skills that apply and increases %Final Damage when active

fifthMain.name: Spiritgate
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 40 sec, Creates a portal that summons 2 spirits lasting 8 sec. Up to 10 spirits can exist simultaneously.
Spirits seek out nearby enemies to inflict 600% damage 6 times. Spirits then collide with the enemy, disappearing and granting them a debuff for 8 sec.
Attacks against an afflicted enemy gain Critical Rate +8% and Critical Damage +1%.Debuff can stack up to 10 times.
Cooldown: 95 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a portal where swarms of spirits will appear and seek out enemies to attack and debuff
details:
[Debuff]: Attacks to this enemy will have increased %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage
  • The effects of the debuff can stack (up to 10 times)

fifthMain.name: True Spirit Claw
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 8, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: 50%\nActivates when Spirit Claw is used\nCooldown: 6 sec
fifthMain.desc: Periodically when using , the true form of the skill will appear, attacking enemies in a bigger radius
details: The skill also gains additional %Ignore DEF

fifthMain.name: Smashing Multipunch
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60. Consecutively attacks up to 10 enemies with 800% damage 5 time(s) during key-down.
Max Key-down Time: 1.3 sec
Upon end of key-down, a final shock attack that attacks 10 enemies with 1900% damage 15 time(s) is activated 3 time(s). Upon successful hits of the final attack, 15 additional Fox Spirits are summoned.
During Smashing Multipunch, any attacks that inflict damage proportional to Max HP will suffer a -50% penalty to damage. Fox Spirits have a 100% chance to appear upon each successful hit.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Furiously punches forward before smashing down for a final attack
details: The final attack creates a shockwave attack and summons several where the smash lands
Each punch has a guaranteed chance to summon a
While casting, you gain increased %Damage Reduction against %Max HP attacks

meta: Shade is STR pirate class part of the Heroes class group. Shade is known for their tanky nature and few buffs to manage. Shade also has several utility skills that benefit parties and bosses greatly
